Posts.Content: Myroo11715 wrote: Hi, I'm 4 months out from my bilateral mastectomy and my range of motion in one arm is limited. I can't extent my arm from my side to my head. I have been going to PT for 2 months and no improvement in that area. I have improved in other ROM aspects. No Chemo or rads needed. Any suggestions? Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Range of motion limit ions after mastectomy Myroo11715 Kicks
